snippet.title: Boom Ball 3 for Kinect Trailer
snippet.description:
It's boom time again! Boom Ball 3 upgrades the classic Kinect ping-pong game, taking you through new scenic landscapes featuring a festival of cute cubic critters. Coming to Xbox One on Dec 22nd, 2017. http://boomballgame.com/bb3

Also includes improved 2-player mode and 3 new difficulty options for novices and veterans alike. Customize your paddles with pictures or take your own photos with Kinect. Suitable for all ages, shapes and sizes!
